<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.58&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Confirmation Letter
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To:&#9;500WAN HK Limited (&ldquo;
<B>
	500WAN
	HK
</B>
	&rdquo;)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Whereas:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	500WAN HK is the sole shareholder of E-Sun
	Sky Computer (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. (&ldquo;E-Sun Sky Computer&rdquo;) and holds 100% of the equity interest in E-Sun Sky Computer;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	E-Sun Sky Computer
</B>
	accepted a Power
	of Attorney respectively from Yu Bo (Chinese Identification No.: 420106196805034857) on Nov 18, 2015 and Yin Zhiwei(Chinese Identification
	No.: 440301198308211914) on Nov 18, 2015 (collectively referred to as the &ldquo;
<B>
	POA
</B>
	&rdquo;). Pursuant to the
<B>
	POA
</B>
	,
	Yu Bo and Yin Zhiwei respectively delegate and authorize
<B>
	E-Sun Sky Computer
</B>
	to exercise their voting powers and all other
	shareholder rights in respect of Shenzhen E-Sun Network Co., Ltd on their behalf (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Rights
</B>
	&rdquo;).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Now therefore, with respect to the exercise
	of the Rights,
<B>
	E-Sun Sky Computer
</B>
	hereby confirms as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	E-Sun Sky Computer
</B>
	hereby confirms that, in exercising the
<B>
	Rights
</B>
	under the
<B>
	POA
</B>
	,
	it shall obtain the consent from
<B>
	500WAN HK
</B>
	in the manner allowed by the PRC Laws.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	E-Sun Sky Computer
</B>
	further confirms that it shall exercise the
<B>
	Rights
</B>
	in accordance
	with the instructions from the third party designated by
<B>
	500WAN HK
</B>
	within the scope allowed by the PRC Laws.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	3.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This confirmation letter shall become effective upon execution, and maintain effective unless the
<B>
	POA
</B>
	is terminated in accordance with the provisions thereof.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	4.
</TD>

	The execution, effectiveness, construction, performance, amendment and termination of this confirmation
	letter and the resolution of disputes hereunder shall be governed by PRC Laws.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	5.
</TD>

	This confirmation letter is written in both Chinese and English language; in case there is any
	conflict between the Chinese version and the English version, the Chinese version shall prevail.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="FONT: 18PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Financial Support Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 18PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	This Financial Support
	Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;) is made and entered into by and among the following parties
	on
<B>
	Nov 18, 2015
</B>
	in Shenzhen, the People&rsquo;s Republic of China (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;PRC&rdquo;):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	500.COM LIMITED (hereinafter
	referred to as &ldquo;500.COM&rdquo;), a company incorporated and existing under the laws of Cayman Islands, with its address at
	PO BOX 309, Ugland House, Grand Cayman, KYI-1104, Cayman Island;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	E-Sun Sky Computer (Shenzhen)
	Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;E-sun Sky Computer&rdquo;), a wholly foreign owned company incorporated and existing
	under the PRC laws, with its address at Room 3-A, Complex Building (including affiliated equipment room), Shenxianling Sports Center,
	Central City, Longgang District, Shenzhen;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	Yu Bo, a Chinese citizen
	with ID Card number of 420106196805034857; and
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	Yin Zhiwei, a Chinese
	citizen with ID Card number of 440301198308211914.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	WHEREAS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	Yu Bo and Yin Zhiwei
	are shareholders of Shenzhen E-Sun Network Co., Ltd. (a limited liability company incorporated and existing under the PRC laws,
	with its address at No. 1-C, Complex Building (including the affiliated equipment room) Shenxianling Sports Center, Central City,
	Longgang District, Shenzhen, hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;E-Sun Network&rdquo;);
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	E-sun Sky Computer is
	a wholly owned subsidiary of 500.COM in the PRC;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	The Parties hereby confirm
	the finance and other matters of E-Sun Network as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	500.COM confirms and
	undertakes that, from the date of this Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;Effective Date&rdquo;), when needed by
	E-Sun Network, 500.COM agrees to unconditionally provide financial support (hereinafter referred to as &ldquo;Financial Support&rdquo;)
	to Yu Bo and Yin Zhiwei by itself or through E-sun Sky Computer in the way permitted by PRC laws and regulations. Yu Bo and Yin
	Zhiwei agree to accept such Financial Support in the way permitted by PRC laws and regulations, and undertake to unconditionally
	use such Financial Support they receive to fund E-Sun Network so as to support the operation and development of E-Sun Network.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	To the extent permitted
	by PRC laws and regulations and other applicable laws, at the request of E-Sun Network, 500.COM agrees to instruct Yu Bo and Yin
	Zhiwei to release E-Sun Network from the obligation of repayment of such Financial Support; if Yu Bo and Yin Zhiwei release E-Sun
	Network from the obligation of repayment of the Financial Support under the instruction of 500.COM, then 500.COM agrees to release
	Yu Bo and Yin Zhiwei from the obligation of repayment of the Financial Support correspondingly by itself or instructing E-sun Sky
	Computer to do so.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	Where 500.COM provides
	financial support to E-Sun Network by itself or through E-sun Sky Computer, the specific provisions shall be otherwise negotiated
	and solved by the Parties hereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	(The remainder of this
	page is intentionally left blank.)
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 21PT">
	&nbsp;

<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_7"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.60&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Shareholder&rsquo;s Voting Power Assignment
	Agreement
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.3IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.3IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.3IN">
	This Shareholder&rsquo;s
	Voting Power Assignment Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;) is made and entered into by the following
	parties on
<B>
	Nov 18, 2015
</B>
	in Shenzhen, the People&rsquo;s Republic of China (hereinafter referred to as the &ldquo;PRC&rdquo;,
	which excludes, for the purpose of this Agreement, Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.3IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Party A:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	E-Sun Sky Computer (Shenzhen)
	Co., Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Registered Address: Room 3-A,
	Complex Building (including affiliated equipment room), Shenxianling Sports Center, Central City, Longgang District, Shenzhen
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Party B:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Yu Bo
</B>
	, ID Card No.:
	420106196805034857;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Yin Zhiwei
</B>
	, ID Card
	No.: 440301198308211914
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Party C:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Shenzhen E-Sun Network Co.,
	Ltd.
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Registered Address: Room 1-C,
	Complex Building (including affiliated equipment room), Shenxianling Sports Center, Central City, Longgang District, Shenzhen
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Party
	A, Party B and Party C shall be hereinafter referred to collectively as the &ldquo;Parties&rdquo; and individually as a &ldquo;Party&rdquo;
</FONT>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	WHEREAS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B are Chinese citizens, and as shareholders of Party C hold 100% equity of Party C (hereinafter
	referred to as &ldquo;Party B&rsquo;s Equity&rdquo;), of which, Yu Bo holds 50% equity of Party C and Yin Zhiwei holds 50% equity
	of Party C.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	2.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B agrees to entrust Party A to exercise its shareholder&rsquo;s rights in Party C in accordance
	with the terms and conditions agreed herein and Party A agrees to accept such entrustment in accordance with the terms and conditions
	agreed herein.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 0.45IN; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -0.45IN; COLOR: PURPLE">
<SUB>
	&nbsp;
</SUB>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 28.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	THEREFORE, the Parties hereby agree as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; COLOR: PURPLE">
<SUB>
	&nbsp;
</SUB>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
<B>
	Article
	1&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	On the effective date
	of this Agreement, Party B irrevocably entrusts Party A to exercise all of its shareholder&rsquo;s voting power and other shareholder&rsquo;s
	rights under the laws and the articles of association on the shareholders&rsquo; meeting of Party C on behalf of Party B, which
	include but not limited to the right to sell, transfer, pledge or dispose any or all of the equity held by Party B in Party C;
	the right to convene, attend or preside over the shareholders&rsquo; meeting of Party C as an authorized representative of Party
	C&rsquo;s shareholder; the right to elect and replace executive director, director, supervisor, manager and other senior executive;
	the right to deliberate and approve the profits distribution scheme and loss make-up scheme of Party C and resolve on Party C&rsquo;s
	merger, split, liquidation or change of corporate form; and the right to decide the operation policy and investment plan of Party
	C and amend the articles of association, etc.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage257"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
<B>
	Article
	2&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Party A agrees to accept
	the proxy granted by Party B in Article 1 hereof, and will exercise such voting power and shareholder&rsquo;s rights on behalf
	of Party B in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
<B>
	Article
	3&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Party B hereby confirms
	that it will entrust Party A to exercise all shareholder&rsquo;s voting power and other shareholder&rsquo;s rights regardless of
	any change in Party C&rsquo;s equity.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
<B>
	Article
	4&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	During the term of this
	Agreement, Party B hereby waives all rights it has granted to Party A through this Agreement in connection with Party B&rsquo;s
	Equity, and will no longer exercise such rights by itself or entrusting other parties other than Party A.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
<B>
	Article
	5&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	This Agreement shall
	be signed by the Parties personally or their respective legal representatives or authorized representatives on the date first written
	above, and become effective on the same day. Unless otherwise explicitly specified herein or except Party A determines to terminate
	this Agreement in writing, this Agreement shall be in full effect and force during the period when Party B holds any equity of
	Party C. During the term of this Agreement, unless otherwise provided for by laws, Party B shall in no case revoke, terminate in
	advance or rescind this Agreement. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Party A may at any time issue a written notice to Party B thirty
	(30) days in advance to terminate this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
<B>
	Article
	6&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Unless otherwise provided
	herein, the amendment to and/or termination of this Agreement must be consented by the Parties in writing. The amendments and supplementary
	agreements to this Agreement which are duly signed by the Parties shall be integral parts of this Agreement and have the same legal
	effect with this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage258"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
<B>
	Article
	7&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	If any provision of this
	Agreement is invalid or unenforceable due to inconsistency with relevant laws, such provision shall be deemed invalid only to the
	extent where the relevant laws apply, and will not affect the legal validity of other provisions of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
<B>
	Article
	8&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Any notice or other communication
	given by any Party as required hereunder shall be written in Chinese and delivered by personal delivery, mail or fax to the following
	address of other Parties or other address as may be designated by other Parties to such Party from time to time. The date on which
	the notice is deemed to have been properly served shall be determined as follows: (a) in case of notice sent by personal delivery,
	it shall be deemed to have been properly served on the same date of personal delivery; (b) in case of notice sent by letter, it
	shall be deemed to have been properly served on the tenth (10
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	) day upon the date of mailing by the registered airmail,
	postage prepaid (and the mailing date shall be the one indicated on the postmark), or the fourth (4
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	) day upon delivery
	to an internationally recognized courier service agency; and (c) in case of notice sent by fax, it shall be deemed to have been
	properly served at the time of receipt showed on the confirmation of transmission of relevant documents.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party A: &#9;E-Sun Sky Computer (Shenzhen)
	Co., Ltd.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Address:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
<B>
	Article
	9&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Without prior written
	consent of Party A, Party B may not assign its rights and obligations hereunder to any third party. Party B hereby agrees that
	Party A may assign its rights and obligations hereunder to any other third party whenever necessary. Party A shall only be required
	to issue a written notice to Party B when such assignment occurs, without the need to obtain consent from Party B on such assignment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
<B>
	Article
	10&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	The Parties acknowledge
	and confirm that any oral or written material mutually exchanged in connection with this Agreement shall be Confidential Information.
	The Parties shall keep in confidential all such information, and without written consent of other Parties, they may not disclose
	any relevant information to any third party except under the following circumstances: (a) where such information is or will be
	known by the general public (for reasons other than the unauthorized disclosure to the public by any Party receiving such information);
	(b) where the disclosure of such information is required by the applicable laws or stock exchange rules or regulations; or (c)
	where any Party needs to disclose such information to its legal or financial advisor for the purpose of the transaction contemplated
	herein, and such legal or financial advisor also needs to assume confidentiality liability similar to that provided in this Article.
	The breach of confidentiality by the staff of or agency retained by any Party shall be deemed as breach of confidentiality by such
	Party, and such Party shall assume the liabilities for breach of contract in accordance with this Agreement. This Article will
	survive the invalidity, change, termination, rescission or inoperability of this Agreement due to any reason.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -21PT">
<B>
	Article
	11&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	The conclusion, validity,
	interpretation, performance, revision and termination and dispute resolution of this Agreement shall be governed by the PRC laws.
	In case of any dispute between the Parties hereto arising out of the interpretation and performance of this Agreement, the Parties
	shall negotiate to solve such dispute in good faith. In case of failure to do so, either Party may submit such dispute to the South
	China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission for arbitration in accordance with the arbitration rules then in
	force. The seat of arbitration shall be Shenzhen, and the language of arbitration shall be Chinese. The arbitration award shall
	be final and binding upon the Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">

<B>
	Article
	12&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Once effective, this
	Agreement shall constitute the entire agreement among the Parties hereto with respect to the content of this Agreement and thoroughly
	supersede all oral and written agreements and understandings among the Parties with respect to the content hereof prior to the
	conclusion of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;

<B>
	Article
	13&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	This Agreement shall
	be made in four original copies, with each Party holding one copy with the same legal effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage262"></A>
<A NAME="V436563_EX4-61_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_8"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.61&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Power of Attorney
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&#9;I,
<B>
	Yu Bo
</B>
	, a Chinese citizen
	with Chinese Identification Card No.
<B>
	420106196805034857
</B>
	, and a holder of 50% of the entire registered capital in
<B>
	Shenzhen
	E-Sun Network Co., Ltd
</B>
	&#9;(the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;) (&ldquo;My Shareholding&rdquo;), hereby irrevocably authorize E-Sun Sky
	Computer (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. (&ldquo;WFOE&rdquo;) to exercise the following rights relating to My Shareholding during the term
	of this Power of Attorney:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	WFOE is hereby authorized
	to act on behalf of myself as my exclusive agent and attorney with respect of all matters concerning My Shareholding, including
	without limitation to: 1) attend shareholder&rsquo;s meetings of Company; 2) exercise all the shareholders&rsquo; rights and shareholders&rsquo;
	voting rights I am entitled to under the laws of China and Company&rsquo;s Articles of Association during the shareholders&rsquo;
	meeting, including but not limited to decide on the sale or transfer or pledge or disposition of My Shareholding in part or in
	whole and execute relevant legal documents; and 3) designate and appoint on behalf of myself the legal representative, the executive
	director, supervisor, the manager and other senior management members of Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Without limiting the
	generality of the powers granted hereunder, WFOE shall have the power and authority under this Power of Attorney to execute the
	Transfer Contracts stipulated in Exclusive Option Agreement, to which I am required to be a party, on behalf of myself, and to
	effect the terms of the Share Pledge Agreement and Exclusive Option Agreement, both dated the date hereof, to which I am a party.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	All the actions associated
	with My Shareholding conducted by WFOE shall be deemed as my own actions, and all the documents related to My Shareholding executed
	by WFOE shall be deemed to be executed by me. I hereby acknowledge and ratify those actions and/or documents by WFOE.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	WFOE is entitled to
	re-authorize or assign its rights related to the aforesaid matters to any other person or entity at its own discretion and without
	giving prior notice to me or obtaining my consent.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	This Power of Attorney
	is coupled with an interest and shall be irrevocable and continuously valid from the date of execution of this Power of Attorney,
	so long as I am a shareholder of Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	This Power of Attorney
	is written in Chinese and English; in case there is any conflict between the Chinese version and the English version, the Chinese
	version shall prevail.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	By: &#9;/s/ Yu Bo
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Date: Nov 18, 2015
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1; OPTIONS: LAST -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage263"></A>
<A NAME="V436563_EX4-62_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_4>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_9"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.62&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Power of Attorney
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&#9;I,
<B>
	Yin Zhiwei
</B>
	, a Chinese citizen
	with Chinese Identification Card No.
<B>
	440301198308211914
</B>
	, and a holder of 50% of the entire registered capital in
<B>
	Shenzhen
	E-Sun Network Co., Ltd
</B>
	&#9;(the &ldquo;Company&rdquo;) (&ldquo;My Shareholding&rdquo;), hereby irrevocably authorize E-Sun Sky
	Computer (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. (&ldquo;WFOE&rdquo;) to exercise the following rights relating to My Shareholding during the term
	of this Power of Attorney:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	WFOE is hereby authorized
	to act on behalf of myself as my exclusive agent and attorney with respect of all matters concerning My Shareholding, including
	without limitation to: 1) attend shareholder&rsquo;s meetings of Company; 2) exercise all the shareholders&rsquo; rights and shareholders&rsquo;
	voting rights I am entitled to under the laws of China and Company&rsquo;s Articles of Association during the shareholders&rsquo;
	meeting, including but not limited to decide on the sale or transfer or pledge or disposition of My Shareholding in part or in
	whole and execute relevant legal documents; and 3) designate and appoint on behalf of myself the legal representative, the executive
	director, supervisor, the manager and other senior management members of Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Without limiting the
	generality of the powers granted hereunder, WFOE shall have the power and authority under this Power of Attorney to execute the
	Transfer Contracts stipulated in Exclusive Option Agreement, to which I am required to be a party, on behalf of myself, and to
	effect the terms of the Share Pledge Agreement and Exclusive Option Agreement, both dated the date hereof, to which I am a party.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	All the actions associated
	with My Shareholding conducted by WFOE shall be deemed as my own actions, and all the documents related to My Shareholding executed
	by WFOE shall be deemed to be executed by me. I hereby acknowledge and ratify those actions and/or documents by WFOE.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	WFOE is entitled to
	re-authorize or assign its rights related to the aforesaid matters to any other person or entity at its own discretion and without
	giving prior notice to me or obtaining my consent.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	This Power of Attorney
	is coupled with an interest and shall be irrevocable and continuously valid from the date of execution of this Power of Attorney,
	so long as I am a shareholder of Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	This Power of Attorney
	is written in Chinese and English; in case there is any conflict between the Chinese version and the English version, the Chinese
	version shall prevail.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	By: &#9;/s/ Yin Zhiwei
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	Date: Nov 18, 2015
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0.5IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
