<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	12.&#9;Amendments and Supplements
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	Any amendments and supplements to this Agreement shall be in
	writing. The amendment agreements and supplementary agreements that have been signed by the Parties and that relate to this Agreement
	shall be an integral part of this Agreement and shall have the same legal validity as this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	13.&#9;Language and Counterparts
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	This Agreement is written in both Chinese and English language
	in two copies, each Party having one copy with equal legal validity; in case there is any conflict between the Chinese version
	and the English version, the Chinese version shall prevail.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Exclusive Option Agreement (this &ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;)
	is executed by and among the following Parties as of
<B>
	Dec 20, 2011
</B>
	in Shenzhen, the People&rsquo;s Republic of China (&ldquo;China&rdquo;
	or the &ldquo;PRC&rdquo;):

	Shenzhen Tongfu Technology Co., Ltd,
</B>
	a limited liability company organized and existing under the laws of the PRC, with its address at No. A1702H, Building A, Union Square, Binhe Road, Futian Street, Futian District, Shenzhen
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In this Agreement, each of Party A, Party
	B and Party C shall be referred to as a &ldquo;Party&rdquo; respectively, and they shall be collectively referred to as the &ldquo;Parties&rdquo;.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Whereas:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B holds
<B>
	1%
</B>
	of the equity interest
	in Party C;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Now therefore, upon mutual discussion and
	negotiation, the Parties have reached the following agreement:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	1&#12289;
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
<U>
	Sale of Purchase of Equity Interest
</U>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	1.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Option Granted
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Party B hereby
	irrevocably grants Party A an irrevocable and exclusive right to purchase, or designate one or more persons (each, a &ldquo;Designee&rdquo;)
	to purchase the equity interests in Party C then held by Party B once or at multiple times at any time in part or in whole at Party
	A&rsquo;s sole and absolute discretion to the extent permitted by Chinese laws and at the price described in Section 1.3 herein
	(such right being the &ldquo;Equity Interest Purchase Option&rdquo;). Except for Party A and the Designee(s), no other person shall
	be entitled to the Equity Interest Purchase Option or other rights with respect to the equity interests of Party B. Party C hereby
	agrees to the grant by Party B of the Equity Interest Purchase Option to Party A. The term &ldquo;person&rdquo; as used herein
	shall refer to individuals, corporations, partnerships, partners, enterprises, trusts or non-corporate organizations.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	1.2
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Steps for Exercise of Equity Interest Purchase Option
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Subject to the
	provisions of the laws and regulations of China, Party A may exercise the Equity Interest Purchase Option by issuing a written
	notice to Party B (the &ldquo;Equity Interest Purchase Option Notice&rdquo;), specifying: a) Party A&rsquo;s decision to exercise
	the Equity Interest Purchase Option, b) the portion of equity interests to be purchased from Party B (the &ldquo;Optioned Interests&rdquo;);
	and c) the date for purchasing the Optioned Interests and/or the date for transfer of the Optioned Interests.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 1 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage321"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	1.3
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Equity Interest Purchase Price
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The purchase price of the Optioned
	Interests (the &ldquo;Base Price&rdquo;) shall be RMB 10. If appraisal is required by the laws of the PRC at the time when Party
	A exercises the Equity Interest Purchase Option, the Parties shall negotiate in good faith and based on the appraisal result make
	necessary adjustment to the Equity Interest Purchase Price so that it complies with any and all then applicable laws of the PRC
	(collectively, the &ldquo;Equity Interest Purchase Price&rdquo;), under such circumstances, Party B shall compensate Party A for
	the difference between the Equity Interests Purchase Price and the Basic Price.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	1.4
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Transfer of Optioned Interests
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	For each exercise of the Equity
	Interest Purchase Option:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	1.4.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B shall cause Party C to promptly convene a shareholder&rsquo;s meeting, at which a resolution
	shall be adopted approving Party B&rsquo;s transfer of the Optioned Interests to Party A and/or the Designee(s);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	1.4.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B shall obtain written statements from the other shareholders of Party B giving consent to
	the transfer of the equity interest to Party A and/or the Designee(s) and waiving any right of first refusal related thereto.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	1.4.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B shall execute a share transfer contract with respect to each transfer with Party A and/or
	each Designee (whichever is applicable), in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement and the Equity Interest Purchase Option
	Notice regarding the Optioned Interests;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	1.4.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The relevant Parties shall execute all other necessary contracts, agreements or documents, obtain
	all necessary government licenses and permits and take all necessary actions to transfer valid ownership of the Optioned Interests
	to Party A and/or the Designee(s), unencumbered by any security interests, and cause Party A and/or the Designee(s) to become the
	registered owner(s) of the Optioned Interests. For the purpose of this Section and this Agreement, &ldquo;security interests&rdquo;
	shall include securities, mortgages, third party&rsquo;s rights or interests, any stock options, acquisition right, right of first
	refusal, right to offset, ownership retention or other security arrangements, but shall be deemed to exclude any security interest
	created by this Agreement and Party B&rsquo;s Share Pledge Agreement. &ldquo;Party B&rsquo;s Share Pledge Agreement&rdquo; as used
	in this Section and this Agreement shall refer to the Share Pledge Agreement (&ldquo;Share Pledge Agreement&rdquo;) executed by
	and among Party A, Party B and Party C as of the date hereof, whereby Party B pledges all of its equity interest in Party C to
	Party A, in order to guarantee Party C&rsquo;s performance of its obligations under the Exclusive Business Corporation Agreement
	executed by and between Party C and Party A.
<B>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage322"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
<U>
	Covenants
</U>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	2.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Covenants regarding Party C
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Party B (as
	the shareholders of Party C) and Party C hereby covenants as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Without the prior written consent of Party A, they shall not in any manner supplement, change or
	amend the articles of association and bylaws of Party C, increase or decrease its registered capital, or change its structure of
	registered capital in other manners;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	They shall maintain Party C&rsquo;s corporate existence in accordance with good financial and business
	standards and practices by prudently and effectively operating its business and handling its affairs;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Without prior written consent of Party A, they shall not at any time following the date hereof,
	sell, transfer, mortgage or dispose of in any manner any assets of Party C or legal or beneficial interest in the business or revenues
	of Party C, or allow the encumbrance thereon of any security interest;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Without prior written consent of Party A, they shall not incur, inherit, guarantee or suffer the
	existence of any debt, except for a) debts incurred in the ordinary course of business other than through loans; and b) debts disclosed
	to Party A for which Party A&rsquo;s written consent has been obtained;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	They shall always operate all of Party C&rsquo;s business during the ordinary course of business
	to maintain the asset value of Party C and refrain from any action/omission that may affect Party C&rsquo;s operating status and
	asset value.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Without prior written consent of Party A, they shall not cause Party C to execute any major contract,
	except the contracts in the ordinary course of business (for purpose of this subsection, a contract with a price exceeding RMB500,000
	shall be deemed a major contract);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Without prior written consent of Party A, they shall not cause Party C to provide any person with
	any loan or credit;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.8
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	They shall provide Party A with information on Party C&rsquo;s business operations and financial
	condition at Party A&rsquo;s request;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.9
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If requested by Party A, they shall procure and maintain insurance in respect of Party C&rsquo;s
	assets and business from an insurance carrier acceptable to Party A, at an amount and type of coverage typical for companies that
	operate similar business;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.10
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Without the prior written consent of Party A, they shall not cause or permit Party C to merge,
	consolidate with, acquire or invest in any person;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.11
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	They shall immediately notify Party A of the occurrence or possible occurrence of any litigation,
	arbitration or administrative proceedings relating to Party C&rsquo;s assets, business or revenue;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.12
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To maintain the ownership by Party C of all of its assets, they shall execute all necessary or
	appropriate documents, take all necessary or appropriate actions and file all necessary or appropriate complaints or raise necessary
	and appropriate defenses against all claims;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.13
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Without prior written consent of Party A, they shall ensure that Party C shall not in any manner
	distribute dividends to its shareholders, provided that upon Party A&rsquo;s written request, Party C shall immediately distribute
	profits to its shareholders; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.1.14
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	At the request of Party A, they shall appoint any persons designated by Party A as the executive
	director of Party C.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 3 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	2.2
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Covenants of Party B and Party C
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Party B hereby
	covenants as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.2.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Without the prior written consent of Party A, Party B shall not sell, transfer, mortgage or dispose
	of in any other manner any legal or beneficial interest in the equity interest in Party C held by Party B, or allow the encumbrance
	thereon of any security interest, except for the pledge placed on these equity interests in accordance with Party B&rsquo;s Share
	Pledge Agreement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.2.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B shall cause the shareholders&rsquo; meeting and/or the executive director of Party C not
	to approve the sale, transfer, mortgage or disposition in any other manner of any legal or beneficial interest in the equity interests
	in Party C held by Party B, or allow the encumbrance thereon of any security interest, without the prior written consent of Party
	A, except for the pledge placed on these equity interests in accordance with Party B&rsquo;s Share Pledge Agreement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.2.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B shall cause the shareholders&rsquo; meeting or the executive director of Party C not to
	approve any merger or consolidation with any person, or any acquisition of or investment in any person, without the prior written
	consent of Party A;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.2.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B shall immediately notify Party A of the occurrence or possible occurrence of any litigation,
	arbitration or administrative proceedings relating to the equity interests in Party C held by Party B;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.2.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B shall cause the shareholders&rsquo; meeting or the executive director of Party C to vote
	their approval of the transfer of the Optioned Interests as set forth in this Agreement and to take any and all other actions that
	may be requested by Party A;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.2.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To the extent necessary to maintain Party B&rsquo;s ownership in Party C, Party B shall execute
	all necessary or appropriate documents, take all necessary or appropriate actions and file all necessary or appropriate complaints
	or raise necessary and appropriate defenses against all claims;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.2.7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B shall appoint any designee of Party A as the executive director of Party C, at the request
	of Party A;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.2.8
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	At the request of Party A at any time, Party B shall promptly and unconditionally transfer its
	equity interests in Party C to Party A&rsquo;s Designee(s) in accordance with the Equity Interest Purchase Option under this Agreement,
	and Party B hereby waives its right of first refusal to the respective share transfer by the other exiting shareholder of Party
	C (if any); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	2.2.9
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B shall strictly abide by the provisions of this Agreement and other contracts jointly or
	separately executed by and among Party B, Party C and Party A, perform the obligations hereunder and thereunder, and refrain from
	any action/omission that may affect the effectiveness and enforceability thereof. To the extent that Party B has any remaining
	rights with respect to the equity interests subject to this Agreement hereunder or under the Share Pledge Agreement among the same
	parties hereto or under the Power of Attorney granted in favor of Party A, Party B shall not exercise such rights except in accordance
	with the written instructions of Party A.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 4 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage324"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
<U>
	Representations and Warranties
</U>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B and Party C hereby represent
	and warrant to Party A, jointly and severally, as of the date of this Agreement and each date of transfer of the Optioned Interests,
	that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	They have the authority to execute and deliver this Agreement and any share transfer contracts
	to which they are parties concerning the Optioned Interests to be transferred thereunder (each, a &ldquo;Transfer Contracts&rdquo;),
	and to perform their obligations under this Agreement and any Transfer Contracts. Party B and Party C agree to enter into Transfer
	Contracts consistent with the terms of this Agreement upon Party A&rsquo;s exercise of the Equity Interest Purchase Option. This
	Agreement and the Transfer Contracts to which they are parties constitute or will constitute their legal, valid and binding obligations
	and shall be enforceable against them in accordance with the provisions thereof;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The execution and delivery of this Agreement or any Transfer Contracts and the obligations under
	this Agreement or any Transfer Contracts shall not: i) cause any violation of any applicable laws of China; ii) be in consistent
	with the articles of association, bylaws or other organizational documents of Party C; iii) cause the violation of any contracts
	or instruments to which they are a party or which are binding on them, or constitute any breach under any contracts or instruments
	to which they are a party or which are binding on them; iv) cause any violation of any condition for the grant and/or continued
	effectiveness any licenses or permits issued to either of them; or v) cause the suspension or revocation of or imposition of additional
	conditions to any licenses or permits issued to either of them;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	3.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party B has a good and merchantable title to the equity interests in Party C he holds. Except for
	Party B&rsquo;s Share Pledge Agreement, Party B has not placed any security interest on such equity interests;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	3.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party C has a good and merchantable title to all of its assets, and has not placed any security
	interest on the aforementioned assets;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	3.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party C does not have any outstanding debts, except for (i) debt incurred in the ordinary course
	of business; and (ii) debts disclosed to Party A for which Party A&rsquo;s written consent has been obtained.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	3.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Party C has complied with all laws and regulations of China applicable to asset acquisitions; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	3.7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	There are no pending or threatened litigation, arbitration or administrative proceedings relating
	to the equity interests in Party C, assets of Party C or Party C.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	4&#12289;
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
<U>
	Effective Date
</U>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	This Agreement
	shall become effective upon the date hereof, and remain effective for a term of 10 years, and may be renewed at Party A&rsquo;s
	sole discretion.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	5.1
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Governing law
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	The execution,
	effectiveness, construction, performance, amendment and termination of this Agreement and the resolution of disputes hereunder
	shall be governed by the formally published and publicly available laws of China. Matters not covered by formally published and
	public available laws of China shall be governed by international legal principles and practices.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	5.2
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
	Methods of Resolution of Disputes
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	In the event
	of any dispute with respect to the construction and performance of this Agreement, the Parties shall first resolve the dispute
	through friendly negotiations. In the event the Parties fail to reach an agreement on the dispute within 30 days after either Party&rsquo;s
	request to the other Parties for resolution of the dispute through negotiations, either Party may submit the relevant dispute to
	the China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission South China Sub-Commission for arbitration, in accordance with
	its Arbitration Rules. The arbitration shall be conducted in Shenzhen, and the language used in arbitration shall be Chinese. The
	arbitration award shall be final and binding of all Parties.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 42PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
<U>
	Taxes and Fees
</U>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Each Party shall
	pay any and all transfer and registration tax, expenses and fees incurred thereby or levied thereon in accordance with the law
	of China in
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	connection with the preparation and execution of this Agreement and the Transfer Contracts, as well as the consummation
	of the transactions contemplated under this Agreement and the Transfer Contracts.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0IN">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<B>
	7.
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
<U>
	Notices
</U>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	7.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	All notices and other communications required or permitted to be given pursuant to this Agreement
	shall be delivered personally or sent by registered mail, postage prepaid, by a commercial courier service or by facsimile transmission
	to the address of such Party set forth below. A confirmation copy of each notice shall also be sent by mail. The dates on which
	notices shall be deemed to have been effectively given shall be determined as follows:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	7.1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Notices given by personal delivery, by courier service or by registered mail, postage prepaid,
	shall be deemed effectively given on the date or receipt or refusal at the address specified for notices.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	7.1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Notices given by facsimile transmission shall be deemed effectively given on the date of successful
	transmission (as evidence by an automatically generated confirmation of transmission).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	7.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	For the purpose of notices, the addresses of the Parties are as follows:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 84PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 84PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42PT">
	Party A: &#9;Room
	3-A, Complex Building (including affiliated equipment room), Shenxianling Sports Center, Central City, Longgang District, Shenzhen
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 84PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42PT">
	Party B: &#9;Room
	3-A, Complex Building (including affiliated equipment room), Shenxianling Sports Center, Central City, Longgang District, Shenzhen
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 84PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -42PT">
	Party C: &#9;No.
	A1702H, Building A, Union Square, Binhe Road, Futian Street, Futian District, Shenzhen
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	7.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any Party may at any time change its address for notices by a notice delivered to the other Parties
	in accordance with the terms hereof.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<B>
<U>
	Confidentiality
</U>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	The Parties
	acknowledge that the existence and the terms of this Agreement and any oral or written information exchanged between the Parties
	in connection with the preparation and performance this Agreement are regarded as confidential information. Each Party shall maintain
	confidentiality of all such confidential information, and without obtaining the written consent of the other Party, it shall not
	disclose any relevant confidential information to any third parties, except for the information that: i) is or will be in the public
	domain (other than through the receiving Party&rsquo;s unauthorized disclosure); ii) is under the obligation to be disclosed pursuant
	to the applicable laws or regulations, rules of any stock exchange, or orders of the court or other government authorities; or
	iii) is required to be disclosed by any Party to its shareholders, investors, legal counsels or financial advisors regarding the
	transaction contemplated hereunder, provided that such shareholders, investors, legal counsels or financial advisors shall be bound
	by the confidentiality obligations similar to those set forth in this Section. Disclosure of any confidential information by the
	staff members or agencies hired by any Party shall be deemed disclosure of such confidential information by such Party, which Party
	shall be held liable for breach of this Agreement. This Section shall survive the termination of this Agreement for any reason.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
<B>
	9.
</B>
</TD>

</U>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	The Parties
	agree to promptly execute documents that are reasonably required for or are conducive to the implementation of the provisions and
	purposes of this Agreement and take further actions that are reasonably required for or are conducive to the implementation of
	the provisions and purposes of this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 21PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0.25IN; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">

	10.

</B>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	10.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Amendments, change and supplement
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Any amendment,
	change and supplement to this Agreement shall require the execution of a written agreement by all of the Parties.
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	10.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Entire agreement
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Except for the
	amendments, supplements or changes in writing executed after the execution of this Agreement, this Agreement shall constitute the
	entire agreement reached by and among the Parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof, and shall supercede all prior
	oral and written consultations, representations and contracts reached with respect to the subject matter of this Agreement.
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	10.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Headings
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	The headings
	of this Agreement are for convenience only, and shall not be used to interpret, explain or otherwise affect the meanings of the
	provisions of this Agreement.
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	10.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Language
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	This Agreement
	is written in both Chinese and English language in three copies, each Party having one copy with equal legal validity; in case
	there is any conflict between the Chinese version and the English version, the Chinese version shall prevail.
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 21PT">
	10.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Severability
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	In the event
	that one or several of the provisions of this Agreement are found to be invalid, illegal or unenforceable in any aspect in accordance
	with any laws or regulations, the validity, legality or enforceability of the remaining provisions of this Agreement shall not
	be affected or compromised in any respect. The Parties shall strive in good faith to replace such invalid, illegal or unenforceable
	provisions with effective provisions that accomplish to the greatest extent permitted by law and the intensions of the Parties,
	and the economic effect of such effective provisions shall be as close as possible to the economic effect of those invalid, illegal
	or unenforceable provisions.
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	This Agreement
	shall be binding on and shall inure to the interest of the respective successors of the Parties and the permitted assigns of such
	Parties.
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

</TD>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 63PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 42PT">
	10.7.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any obligations that occur or that are due as a result of this Agreement upon the expiration or
	early termination of this Agreement shall survive the expiration or early termination thereof.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 63PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Any Party may
	waive the terms and conditions of this Agreement, provided that such a waiver must be provided in writing and shall require the
	signatures of the Parties. No waiver by any Party in certain circumstances with respect to a breach by other Parties shall operate
	as a waiver by such a Party with respect to any similar breach in other circumstances.
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<B>
	Exclusive Option Agreement

</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Exclusive Option Agreement (this &ldquo;Agreement&rdquo;)
	is executed by and among the following Parties as of
<B>
	Dec 20, 2011
</B>
	in Shenzhen, the People&rsquo;s Republic of China (&ldquo;China&rdquo;
	or the &ldquo;PRC&rdquo;):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
</P>
